item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Getting there - after a big development effort, ArmorPaint 1.0 alpha builds are coming soon.üñå

item.description:
ArmorPaint 0.9 is out now - 3D texturing app for desktop, iOS and Android.üñå

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Preparing to release ArmorPaint 0.9. Website just got a big update.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Tons of polishing done in the latest ArmorPaint builds. iOS and Android update coming next.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New ArmorPaint builds are out on iOS and Android. More to come!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Thank you for the big interest in the iPad version - will be rolling updates regularly. All feedback on GitHub is very welcome!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description:
ArmorPaint 0.8 is out - 3D texture painting app now on desktop, iPad and Android.üñå

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Submitted to the AppStore, in the review process now.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint on iPadOS with cloud support. Coming to the AppStore!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Drag and drop procedural edge wear onto your models in ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Unlimited masks per layer and mask blending now in the latest ArmorPaint builds.

item.description:

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Working on procedural edge wear materials for ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Non-destructive decal layers now available in ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Use decals as a brush mask in the latest ArmorPaint builds.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Painting translucency in the upcoming ArmorPaint ray-tracing update.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Use nodes to control layer masks in ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Live material node preview, new blur node and a boatload of bug fixes now in the latest ArmorPaint builds.üì¶

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Path-traced viewport and ray-traced baking in ArmorPaint now runs on both Direct3D12 and Vulkan, Windows and Linux, Nvidia and the upcoming AMD cards.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint running on iPadOS. Powered by Metal @ 120fps with Apple Pencil support. ‚úè

item.description:

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint launches on Android - development builds are up, with support for pen pressure, touch, keyboard, mouse and mirroring to big screen. iPadOS will follow!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint has been awarded an Epic MegaGrant! Full steam ahead to build the best possible open-source 3D painting software!üèÖ

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New ArmorPaint 0.8 dev builds! Working on asset browser with material previews, layer grouping, script console, faster ray-tracing, painting transparent surfaces.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description:
Learn ArmorPaint by watching short clips. üéì
armorpaint.org/howto

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description:
ArmorPaint 0.7 is out - new features, tons of fixes and updated manual. Video tutorials section coming!
armorpaint.org/notes

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Baking update for ArmorPaintDXR is up - raytraced ao, cavity, bent normals, thickness, lightmap, curvature, dilate pass, reduced gpu mem usage.üçû

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New ArmorPaint dev builds are up, gearing up for 0.7 release. Focused on fixes but has new stuff as well - custom export presets with channel swizzling, read layers and masks with material nodes, udim tiles export, built-in uv unwrap, improved dxr support.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Testing out plugin for @UnrealEngine. Paint onto objects by summoning ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Small feature to improve workflow in ArmorPaint. Quickly re-import mesh from source obj/fbx/blend file.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Adding a way to create custom material nodes with plugins. Will make it possible to integrate new node systems, extend existing node set or write material shader by hand.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description:
More goodies in latest ArmorPaint dev builds.üì¶ Split view, plugin manager, auto-save, improved decal scaling, UV controls for fill layers, faster layer handling, blend modes, enhanced picker tool.
armorpaint.org/notes

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Approaching the holy grail - path-tracing viewport in ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: A new ArmorPaintDXR build is up, featuring 'Bake - AO (DXR)' option. It's the first build ever running on Direct3D12.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Texture Synthesis by @EmbarkStudios running in ArmorPaint as a plugin. Make non-tiling textures tile. First step towards generating materials from photos!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Friday fun - 'procedural' Commodore 64 material.üì∫ Actual emulator compiled from C to WebAssembly, running in ArmorPaint as a plugin. Check out github.com/floooh/chips by @FlohOfWoe!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Fun with terrain in ArmorPaint. Improving height map sculpting features.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Working on ray-traced baking in ArmorPaint.üçû

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New video is up! Texturing in ArmorPaint 0.6.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Upcoming ArmorPaint ray-tracing update now in testing phase.ü§ñ

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Cooking some edge wear materials, powered by curvature baker. Drag and drop material from the shelf to apply.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New ArmorPaint builds are up! Curvature baker, 16/32bit painting, .exr export, undo for layer operations, custom keymaps, 256 layers per project.üé®

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description:
Under the hood, ArmorPaint 0.5 vs 0.6. üöÄ
23% faster painting
34% less gpu mem for layer storage
43% less gpu mem for mesh storage
72% faster startup
59% faster .obj import

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New 3D brush cursor with topological warp + angle and depth rejection in latest ArmorPaint builds.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New features landed in ArmorPaint - triplanar mapping, symmetry paint, texture viewer, native file dialogs, initial .blend material importer.üé®

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Fresh ArmorPaint development builds are up! New layer tools, UDIM, 2D paint, masking.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint gearing up for ray tracing.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Advancing layer management in ArmorPaint. Per-layer masking, blending, opacity and channel control.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Adding particle brushes into ArmorPaint to achieve rain effect!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New text tool in ArmorPaint. Drop in a font file and stamp text onto objects. Text has active material applied.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Advancing the decal tool in ArmorPaint. Applies all channels at once and supports opacity masking now.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New ArmorPaint development builds are now up if you feel adventurous, approaching 0.6 release!üé®

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint is getting more and more refined.ü§†üñå

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint + latest Armory engine. Importing 650MB .obj file(7.2M tris) - 32% lower memory usage, 15% faster when painting. Must have all the speed!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: If you are eyeing a 3D painting software, ArmorPaint just happens to have another big upgrade around the corner. Humbled by the enormous support!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint gets the biggest update yet - 0.5 is live!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: New ArmorPaint builds incoming! Painting 3M triangle mesh, all PBR maps at once.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Kha can do ray-tracing now powered by D3D12 and soon Vulkan. Endless possibilities! First test - primitive path-tracing renderer in Armory.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint 0.4 is out! Material previews, height painting, sticker tool and first peek at undo support.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Adding sticker tool and live material previews to ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Height-maps in upcoming ArmorPaint - generating procedural terrain with hand-painted road layer.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Painting height textures in ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint 0.3 is out! Layers, color-id maps, plugins, themes, pen pressure, erase tool, refined ui.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Wrapping up new ArmorPaint builds - now with support for color-id maps and plugins written in JS or WebAssembly.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Testing the new Kha pen API in ArmorPaint!

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint hits version 0.2! Check out what's new.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: ArmorPaint is out now! 3D PBR texture painting tool powered by Armory.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Still coming! 3D character painting in ArmorPaint.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Pushed updates to the UI library used in Armory tools.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Armory painter tool now with a website, launching next month.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: More progress on Armory painter - added VR/AR mode and mobile/web support.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Stress-testing Armory painter tool on a sculpted 1.35M triangle mesh. Up to 20K texture painting using 6GB+ graphics card.

item.title: Armory3D News
item.description: Armory-powered GPU painting tool taking shape - Cycles-like node materials for brushes with instant voxel GI enabled preview.

item.description:
Watch some GPU based 3D painting I have been working on using Armory & Kha.
